features: We use recycled materials because they save water and energy
They also help divert waste from landfills and prevent CO2 - helping to keep our planet clean and combat climate change
Made in better working conditions with living wages, no child labor, freely chosen employment and respect for the environment
This product is knitted in a way that creates no seams
No seams means greater comfort and durability because there are no weak points in the garment
We recommend the conscious choice of 30°C
Please use a Guppyfriend™ when washing
